name: cosmos-hub
description: - [ ] GUI should be responsive and work well for recent versions of mobile and PC web browsers - [ ] `index.js` shows a list of the most recent ten blocks along with when they were created (table, list, dates) - [ ] `index.js` includes an interactive form that lets the user input a number and search for a particular block. IF the block exists, it should redirect them to a block details view. - [ ] There should be a block details view that let users view the information for a specific block - [ ] unit tests for the block explorer
